quest: Which of the following is a fundamental principle of British Life?
quest_zh: 以下哪項是英國生活的基本原則？

quest: The Welsh language, spoken in Wales and is taught in schools and universities, is a completely different language from English
quest_zh: 威爾士語在威爾士說，在學校和大學中教授，與英語完全不同

quest: Magistrates and Justices of the Peace (JPs) are members of what?
quest_zh: 和平的裁判官和大法官（JPS）是什麼成員？

quest: It is illegal for shops and businesses to not accept the banknotes of Northern Ireland and Scotland
quest_zh: 商店和企業不接受北愛爾蘭和蘇格蘭的鈔票是非法的

quest: Which of these statements is correct?
quest_zh: 這些陳述中的哪個是正確的？

answers.answer: People found guilty of certain criminal offences cannot stand for Public Office
answers.answer_zh: 裁定某些刑事罪行的人們不能代表公職

answers.answer: People found guilty of all criminal offences cannot stand for Public Office
answers.answer_zh: 人們裁定所有刑事罪行都無法代表公職

quest: How long does it take to give blood?
quest_zh: 流血需要多長時間？

quest: Henry VIII's fourth wife, Anne of Cleves was a Spanish princess
quest_zh: 亨利八世的第四任妻子，克萊夫斯的安妮是西班牙公主

quest: St George is the national saint of Northern Ireland
quest_zh: 聖喬治是北愛爾蘭的國家聖人

quest: Discrimination in the workplace is a criminal offence
quest_zh: 工作場所的歧視是刑事犯罪

quest: Which TWO British Actors have recently won Oscars?
quest_zh: 哪兩個英國演員最近贏得了奧斯卡獎？

quest: In which years did British Film Studios flourish?
quest_zh: 英國電影製片廠在哪幾年蓬勃發展？

quest: At the beginning of the Middle Ages, Ireland was an independent country
quest_zh: 在中世紀開始時，愛爾蘭是一個獨立的國家

quest: Only members of the public who have their name on the electoral register can listen to debates in the Palace of Westminister in the House of Lords
quest_zh: 只有在選舉登記冊上有名字的公眾才能在上議院的威斯特米斯特宮中聽辯論

quest: Which official holiday is celebrated on the 30th November in Scotland?
quest_zh: 11月30日在蘇格蘭慶祝哪個官方假期？

quest: What do the Brit Awards celebrate?
quest_zh: 英國大獎慶祝什麼？

quest: Who gets appointed by local authorities to be the ceremonial leader of the council?
quest_zh: 誰被地方當局任命為理事會的禮儀領導人？

quest: How is the Church of England often called?
quest_zh: 英格蘭教會經常被打電話？

quest: In which UK country can you find the best preserved prehistoric village in northern Europe?
quest_zh: 您可以在哪個英國找到北歐保存完好的史前村莊？

quest: Which of the following was written by Lord Byron?
quest_zh: 拜倫勳爵撰寫了以下哪項？

quest: What are TWO of the activities that you might be involved in when canvassing?
quest_zh: 拉票時可能參與的兩項活動是什麼？

answers.answer: Handing out leaflets in the street
Knocking on people's doors and asking for their support
answers.answer_zh: 敲門並尋求他們的支持

answers.answer: Getting paid for each vote obtained in commission
answers.answer_zh: 為在委員會中獲得的每次投票獲得報酬

answers.answer: Getting paid for the time spent advertising

quest: In Elizabeth I's time, English settlers began to colonise which part of the world?
quest_zh: 在伊麗莎白一世時代，英國定居者開始殖民世界的哪個部分？

quest: Falkland Islands are a Crown Dependency
quest_zh: 福克蘭群島是王冠的依賴

quest: Who is considered ineligible to do jury service?
quest_zh: 誰被認為沒有資格進行陪審團服務？

quest: People living and working in towns after Black Death led to the development of what?
quest_zh: 黑人死後，人們在城鎮生活和工作導致了什麼？
